sentences.sentence: I Experiments on animals entailing physical or psychological suffering violate the rights of animals.
sentences.translation: 任何带给动物生理或心理痛苦的试验都有违动物的权利。

sentences.sentence: Poverty reduction is a systematic project entailing a set of supporting policies and mechanisms as well as full participation of the entire society.
sentences.translation: 减贫是一项系统性工程，需要一系列政策机制的支撑保障和全社会的积极参与。
